name: The Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby

shows.title: In conversation with Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby
shows.desc:
Let’s spend an hour with the head honcho of the Church of England! It’s great to get the chance to check in with the Archbishop of Canterbury every now and then. Let’s ask him how it's going? How he's doing? What keeps him awake at night? What sends him to sleep in the day? Let’s glean some wit and wisdom.

Greenbelt trustee, campaigner and broadcaster Chine McDonald, and Martin Wroe, co-author of Lifelines, Notes on Life & Love, Faith & Doubt, ask the questions.

shows.title: Michael Ramsey Prize Giving
shows.desc:
Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby reveals the winner of the Michael Ramsey Prize 2019.

Hear from the judges why theology matters to them, and how this inspired the selection of the six short-listed book titles chosen for their contribution to contemporary theology.
